restaurant.name: La Cosecha
restaurant.subtitle: Mexican Bistro
restaurant.description: Our concept is a modern Mexican cuisine based on traditional dishes that inspire us everyday. At La Cosecha, we want to serve you the best and most delicious Mexican dishes with a unique and modern touch that identifies us while at the same time providing you with a warm welcome and excellent service.

items.name: Pork Belly Bites
items.description: Crispy pork belly with salsa verde and pickled onions. Served with tortillas.

items.name: Chicken Taquitos
items.description: Chicken tinga stuffed taquitos with guajillo sauce, sour cream and chipotle aioli.

items.name: Queso Fundido
items.description: Melted cheese with house pork chorizo. Served with tortillas.

items.name: Guacamole & Chips
